languages.text: "Я — Генерал-Фабрикатор. На моих плечах лежит священная ноша лидерства". {n}Мужчина поводит плечами, на которых покоится энергетическая установка.{/n} "Прочие боятся вас, ведь призраки могут увести живого с собой в небытие. Но меня оберегает благость Марнат".

"I am the Fabricator General. My shoulders bear the sacred burden of leadership." {n}The man shifts his shoulders, bent under the potentia coil resting upon them.{/n} "The others fear you, as ghosts can carry the living away into nothingness. But I am protected by Marnat's grace."
languages.original_text: "Я — Генерал-Фабрикатор. На моих плечах лежит священная ноша лидерства". {n}Мужчина поводит плечами, на которых покоится энергетическая установка.{/n} "Прочие боятся вас, ведь призраки могут увести живого с собой в небытие. Но меня оберегает благость Марнат".

traits.locale_text: "I am the Fabricator-General. My shoulders bear the sacred burden of leadership." {n}The man shifts his shoulders, which are weighed down by a potentia coil resting upon them.{/n} "The others fear you, as ghosts can carry the living away into nothingness. But I am protected by Marnat's grace."
traits.speaker: Chief

traits.locale_text: "I am the Fabricator General. My shoulders bear the sacred burden of leadership." {n}The man shifts his shoulders, bent under the potentia coil resting upon them.{/n} "The others fear you, as ghosts can carry the living away into nothingness. But I am protected by Marnat's grace."

languages.text: 「私は製造総司令だ。指導者という聖なる責任をこの双肩に負っている」{n}ポテンシア・コイルが肩にのしかかるように、男は肩を動かす。{/n}「他の者はあなたを恐れている。亡霊が生きた者を無へと連れ去るかもしれぬと。だが、私はマルナトの恩寵で守られている」
languages.original_text: "I am the Fabricator General. My shoulders bear the sacred burden of leadership." {n}The man shifts his shoulders, bent under the potentia coil resting upon them.{/n} "The others fear you, as ghosts can carry the living away into nothingness. But I am protected by Marnat's grace."

traits.locale_text: 「私は製造総司令だ。指導者という聖なる責任をこの双肩に負っている」{n}ポテンシア・コイルが肩にのしかかるように、男は肩を動かす。{/n}「他の者はあなたを恐れている。亡霊が生きた者を無へと連れ去るかもしれぬと。だが、私はマルナトの恩寵で守られている」
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: “我是铸造将军，肩负着领导者的神圣重任。”{n}这个人被身上的电位线圈压弯了背，活动了一下肩膀。{/n}“其他人害怕你们，因为鬼魂会把活人带走，使其化为虚无。但我并不害怕，因为我受玛纳特的恩典庇护。”
languages.original_text: "I am the Fabricator General. My shoulders bear the sacred burden of leadership." {n}The man shifts his shoulders, bent under the potentia coil resting upon them.{/n} "The others fear you, as ghosts can carry the living away into nothingness. But I am protected by Marnat's grace."

traits.locale_text: “我是铸造将军，肩负着领导者的神圣重任。”{n}这个人被身上的电位线圈压得浑身发麻，活动了一下肩膀。{/n}“其他人害怕你们，因为鬼魂会把活人带走，使之化为虚无。但我并不害怕，因为我受玛纳特的恩典庇护。”
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: « Je suis le fabricator général. Je suis chargé de la tâche sacrée de diriger. » {n}Il secoue légèrement ses épaules alourdies par le transformateur de puissance.{/n} « Les autres vous craignent, car les fantômes peuvent attirer les vivants dans le néant. Mais la grâce de Marnat me protège. »
languages.original_text: "I am the Fabricator General. My shoulders bear the sacred burden of leadership." {n}The man shifts his shoulders, bent under the potentia coil resting upon them.{/n} "The others fear you, as ghosts can carry the living away into nothingness. But I am protected by Marnat's grace."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis le fabricator général. Je suis chargé de la tâche sacrée de diriger. » {n}Il secoue légèrement ses épaules alourdies par le transformateur de puissance.{/n} « Les autres vous craignent, car les fantômes peuvent attirer les vivants dans le néant. Mais la grâce de Marnat me protège. »
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: «Soy el Fabricator General. Sobre mi recae el sagrado peso del liderazgo». {n}El hombre se recoloca los hombros, doblegados por el peso de la bobina de potencia que descansa sobre ellos.{/n} «Los demás te temen, pues los fantasmas pueden arrastrar a los vivos hacia la nada, pero a mí me protege la gracia de Marnat».
languages.original_text: "I am the Fabricator General. My shoulders bear the sacred burden of leadership." {n}The man shifts his shoulders, bent under the potentia coil resting upon them.{/n} "The others fear you, as ghosts can carry the living away into nothingness. But I am protected by Marnat's grace."

traits.locale_text: «Soy el Fabricator General. Sobre mi recae el sagrado peso del liderazgo». {n}El hombre se recoloca los hombros, sobrecargado con la bobina de potencia que descansa sobre ellos.{/n} «Los demás te temen, pues los fantasmas pueden arrastrar a los vivos hacia la nada, pero a mí me protege la gracia de Marnat».
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: "Ich bin der Manufactor Principalis. Meine Schultern tragen die heilige Last der Führung." {n}Der Mann verlagert seine Schultern, auf denen die Last einer Potentia-Spule ruht.{/n} "Die anderen fürchten Euch, denn Geister können die Lebenden ins Nichts tragen. Ich aber werde von Marnats Gnade beschützt."
languages.original_text: "I am the Fabricator General. My shoulders bear the sacred burden of leadership." {n}The man shifts his shoulders, bent under the potentia coil resting upon them.{/n} "The others fear you, as ghosts can carry the living away into nothingness. But I am protected by Marnat's grace."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin der Manufactor Principalis. Meine Schultern tragen die heilige Last der Führung." {n}Der Mann bewegt seine Schultern, die von der Potentia-Spule belastet sind, die auf ihnen ruht.{/n} "Die anderen fürchten Euch, denn Geister können die Lebenden ins Nichts tragen. Ich aber werde von Marnats Gnade beschützt."
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: "Ben Tümfabrikatörüm. Liderliğin kutsal yükünü omuzlarımda taşıyorum." {n}Adam, üzerlerindeki salahiyet bobini nedeniyle yamulmuş omuzlarını oynatıyor.{/n} "Hayaletler, yaşayanları hiçliğe taşıyabildiği için diğerleri sizden korkuyor. Bense Marnat'ın lütfuyla korunuyorum."
languages.original_text: "I am the Fabricator General. My shoulders bear the sacred burden of leadership." {n}The man shifts his shoulders, bent under the potentia coil resting upon them.{/n} "The others fear you, as ghosts can carry the living away into nothingness. But I am protected by Marnat's grace."

traits.locale_text: "Ben Tümfabrikatör'üm. Liderliğin kutsal yükünü benim omuzlarım taşıyor." {n}Adam, üzerlerindeki salahiyet bobini nedeniyle yamulmuş omuzlarını hareket ettiriyor.{/n} "Hayaletler, yaşayanları hiçliğe taşıyabildiği için diğerleri sizden korkuyor ama ben Marnat'ın lütfuyla korunuyorum."
traits.speaker: Chief
